headline.main: BRITISH CHILDREN TO GET YULE GIFTS; War Relief Society Here Asks Industry and Business to Aid Campaign

lead_paragraph: The British War Relief Society, 730 Fifth Avenue, announced yesterday that it had launched a special movement to provide Christmas gifts for British children otherwise facing a cheerless holiday season. The organization has mailed to some 10,000 industrial and mercantile concerns in this city and other leading cities of the country copies of a letter and a folder describing a special "dollar gift" campaign.
abstract: Lr on N Y C Brit War Relief Soc Xmas gifts for children campaign
